title: como agua para chocolate
content:
apols for rubbish photo; could find anything online. this could be scanned on monday if the photo is too bad.

i have a feeling this might be from south america. when i saw this i realised it is the type i've been looking for a long time..a perfect manifestiation of the fauve/'m curve' thing (see previous typophile discussions).

thanks.

geraint

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Image053.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023171309/http:/typophile.com/files/Image053.jpg) | 359.11 KB |
author: geraintf

comments.content:
I think this is Quiosco by Cyrus Highsmith (Font Bureau).

- Mike Yanega

so it is. thanks again mike.

it is part of FB's readability series, so unfortunately the price puts the type well out of my grasp :(

That seems to be the way foundries limit the exposure of certain typefaces. You are a victim of marketing strategy, alas.

- Mike Yanega
